title: What Charlotte Tilbury Can’t Live Without
text:
Aquazzura Moonlight Textured-Lamé Platform Sandals

I live in high heels. If I wear flats, my personality feels flat, too. My husband recently bought me the most heavenly pair of Aquazzura shoes which I LOVE. They’re 1950s-inspired silver-and-gold heels, and I call them my princess shoes. I often say that high heels and dancing are my only form of exercise. Even though I’m on my feet all day, I can’t function without some power heels.

[Editor’s Note: We found these Aquazzura platform sandals in gold, but with their metallic tone, they’re a convincing dupe for the moonlight textured pair.]
description: Makeup artist Charlotte Tilbury tells us about her favourite things including Premium Natural Jade Roller, Bella Freud Parfum Loving Tuberose and Sandalwood scented candle and Bose SoundLink Revolve Portable Bluetooth 360 Speaker.
